quote: Innocent tourists? You make me sound like the big bad wolf.”“And you’re not?” I questioned.“Only if you’re Red Riding Hood,” he said flirtatiously.“Wow, that’s original.
quote_letters: INNOCENT TOURISTS YOU MAKE ME SOUND LIKE THE BIG BAD WOLFAND YOURE NOT I QUESTIONEDONLY IF YOURE RED RIDING HOOD HE SAID FLIRTATIOUSLYWOW THATS ORIGINAL
